suggest.illuminate\/cookie: Sentry provides an Illuminate cookie driver for cookie integration.
suggest.illuminate\/database: Sentry provides Eloquent models for User, Group and Throttle providers.
suggest.dhorrigan\/capsule: Capsule is a small utility for managing database connections given to illuminate/database outside of Laravel 4.
suggest.illuminate\/session: Sentry provides an Illuminate session driver for storage integration.
suggest.ircmaxell\/password-compat: A forward-compatible PHP 5.5 password package for password_* functions can be used as a hasher (NativeHasher) in Sentry.
